General.Name: Sunstone Hotel Investors Inc
General.Description: Sunstone Hotel Investors, Inc. is a lodging real estate investment trust ("REIT") that as of the date of this release owns 15 hotels comprised of 7,253 rooms, the majority of which are operated under nationally recognized brands. Sunstone's strategy is to create long-term stakeholder value through the acquisition, active ownership, and disposition of well-located hotel and resort real estate.
General.Address: 15 Enterprise, Aliso Viejo, CA, United States, 92656
